How Is Aluminum Tube Used in Compressed Air?
Generally, the compressed air product composed of air compressor, propane storage tank, cooling and drying out machine and filter. The pipe transportation of aluminum tube is ignored by most customers is additionally an important part of the air compressor system. Pipe material selection, design and installation of aluminum tube is quite critical, poor quality material pipe is simple to cause compressed air transmission pipe oxidation rust, air seapage deformation, aging brittle and some other problems.

At present, in the particular field of compressed air, it is an increasing number of important to replace copper tv with aluminum alloy tube. To be able to save the cost of live materials, it is necessary to be able to replace copper tubes with metal alloy tubes. Through the theoretical calculation in addition to experimental analysis of heat transfer from the air conditioning jacket condenser along with aluminum tube replacing copper tv, the correctness of the theoretical calculation style of heat transfer is verified, along with the heat transfer characteristics are studied. The results show that in contrast to copper tubes, multilayer aluminum tubes include higher energy absorption capacity and also higher energy absorption rate.





How Is Aluminum Tube Employed in Solar System?
The solar energy special purpose pipe is each sort of hot water system’s body water line. With the promotion of the concept of environmental protection and electrical power saving, the solar water heater is a lot more widely used in the arena of heating. And pipeline of fluctuation water of solar power water heater because be placed outdoor for a long time, bear winter cold tide and summer frequent cold difficulties alternates effect, have very high requirement for the strict sex of conduit as well as stability. In view of the special requirements of solar trouble pipes, the performance of aluminum plastic pipes is preferable to that of traditional pipes, which effectively solves the purely natural defects of traditional pipes from the system application.
